full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE LDAN BKA' BRGYUD RIN PO CHE'I BKA' SROL PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO RTZA 'GREL RNAMS KYI 'GREL BSHAD MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB KYI BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @202A *, ,(CES DGE LDAN BKA' BRGYUD RIN PO CHE'I BKA' SROL PHYAG @203A *, ,RGYA CHEN PO RTZA 'GREL RNAMS KYI 'GREL BSHAD MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB KYI BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, SHES BYA'I GNAS LA RNAM DPYOD KYI SBYANGS PA MI DMAN PA SPEL KHANG RJE DRUNG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN KHANG DPON DBON PO BLO BZANG TSE RING, NYE 'KHOR BA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG RDO RJE BCAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS DBEN GNAS DGA' LDAN CHOS GLING DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG) ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,,
